title: Doombots
body:
Have you played this game mode? Have you had experience? Do you want it back.

Every game mode came back twice at least in 2015. Yet Doombots haven't. I'm sure there are people out there that would want this game mode back.

Who enjoyed this game mode? Besides from me ofc.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: If Riot brought this back even for like a week I would be so happy. If Riot made it a permanent option then I would be even happier.
It'd be nice if they just added "Doom" to the bot options in custom games.
I love Doombots, would love to see them again.

> Every game mode came back twice at least in 2015.

Not a single mode has made more than 1 appearance in 2015, and 3 haven't even made more than 1 including their debuts.

One For All was first released in 2013, making one appearance that year. OFA: Mirror Mode made one appearance in *2014* and OFA, in it's original form (with some slight balancing changes), made a *single* appearance in 2015, during the second half of October.

Hexakill made 2 appearances in 2014, one at the start of the year as it's original release and another appearance in October of that same year as Hexakill: TT with a *single* appearance in 2015.

Ultra Rapid Fire made it's original appearance for April Fools in 2014, with only a *single* appearance since for April Fools in 2015.

Ascension has made only a *single* appearance, in *2014* no less!

Both Black Market Brawlers and Nemesis Draft have each made a *single* appearance (both their debut).

Honestly, just be patient. I'd say it's more than likely Riot will bring it back some time next year (possibly with an altered style like certain previous re-released featured game modes).

Ascension and Black Market Brawlers they're still fairly new. However I think Riot might not be making Doombots again cause they need to do "All this work" which is for colour blind people, changing champion spells and recalls to a different colour as the map is all and mainly dark. So on and so on. Also the fact was that it was on the OLD map of SR not the New so they'll have to make the new one all dark themed. You catch my drift about now.
i never tryed it what is it about

It was honestly the best mode ever, I'll get hate for this but URF was so overhyped. I think this was the most fun game mode released.

[This](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i7YGtxF1iGU) video pretty much sums it up.
Yes, you are right URF is to overrated but I like it cause it's for remembrance of URF the Mantee to bad they didn't beg for him to stay as a Champ as they did for Lee Sin.
Watch it on Youtube :) There are 3 lvls in Doombots.  lvls 1,2 and 5. You'll see Riot employees playing it

NO IM NOT GOING BACK TO THAT GOD FORSAKEN PLACE AGAIN
*sits in the corner crying* 
Those lux and ezreal ults everywhere. . .
10 - 12 directions of lux ults is cancer. are you cancer?
Good to train ppl for when they play ranked.
big deal it's just Korean intro Bots
Intro? There were three lvls lvl 1 2 and 5
Sorry... but I want URF the most XD
